subject: SMS notification not working
description_text:
Hello, on 3 november, around 10:45 EEST I ordered Simsonn Plus X Racing
Simulation Pedal and I put my phone number. Unfortunately I didn't saved my
order number and I did not get any SMS notification. Can you update me on
the order status? The phone number is: +40726089176
I can provide the payment details if needed

Have a great day,
-- 

*RÄƒzvan Dorcioman*
*+40 726 089 176*
*razvan.dorcioman98@gmail.com <razvan.dorcioman98@gmail.com>*

conversations.body_text: Hi Razvan Dorcioman,    Your order has been shipped. Here is your tracking link.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326630143DE https://www.yuntrack.com/parcelTracking?id=YT2530800703911600
